name: PooPride
description:
More fun than a marathon session on the crapper,
PooPride brings sweet relief through the power of gut-busting laughter and a simple but rewarding poo-based racing game.

Try to hit the break button before you head over the cliff
or else you'll wind up in poop creek without a paddle!

But you'll lose if you stop behind your rival,
and it will be tough turds for you!

This trial web version gives you 30 lives (plays on Firefox or Safari, not Chrome).

Want more? Get the free PooPride app on Google Play!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dicecreative.poopride&hl=en
